sidebar.message: Would you like collaborate on your data science project? Connect with us through our Data Science Services program.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.message: Welcome to the Data Science Map. We encourage you to set up your profile to make it easier for others to find you.  To edit your profile, just click the 'Edit My Profile' button at the top left. We hope you enjoy using the Data Science Map.
